p: To verify the efficacies of the 52 candidate herbs, we performed a brief literature review. We found at least one example each of reported skincare efficacy for 46 herbs ( Table 3). The six exceptions were Aconiti Lateralis Preparata Radix, Arisaematis Rhizoma, Asini Corii Colla, Dolichoris Semen, Euphorbiae Kansui Radix, and Succinum.
